hero_title: Where every tool is within your reach.
hero_describe: Download videos, create QR codes, share source code, and access many other utilities — all free and easy to use.
explore_describe: We create free tools and web design services to help you learn, create, and connect. With just a few clicks, you can download videos, generate QR codes, share code snippets, or build your own professional website.
explore_media_download_title: Download videos quickly to your device
explore_media_download_describe: Just paste a video link, and DLTeam will help you download high-quality MP4/MP3 files. Supports many popular platforms and formats, making it easy to use offline or share again.
explore_qr_describe: Choose the content type (URL, Text, Contact, Wi-Fi), customize colors, and download as PNG/SVG for printing or online use. Crisp QR codes compatible with all scanners.
explore_share_code_describe: Convenient for using trending code snippets — we’ll upload them as embeddable blog content. You can share them with your loved ones with just one click.
explore_desgin_web_describe: From landing pages to online stores, we design responsive, mobile-optimized, and SEO-friendly websites. Support includes idea consulting, interface design, and implementation.
footer_describe: A platform for sharing tools and creative ideas, helping everyone work, learn, and connect easily in the digital era.
